name: Lobe Lemur
movement: walk 40 ft., swim 30 ft., climb 40 ft.
description: The Lobe Lemur is a small, agile monstrosity known for its unique combat abilities, blending into swampy environments with ease.
memorable: It can attach to an opponent's head with its Face Clamp, blinding them until the end of their next turn.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate prey using its agility and camouflage.
relations: Commonly found in swamps alongside other stealthy and ambush creatures.
strengths: Excels in Dexterity, making it difficult to hit and capable of impressive leaps.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting its interactions outside combat.
attacks: Can deliver a multiattack with either multiple slashing Claw Swipes or a Face Clamp that inflicts blindness.
most_powerful_ability: The Face Clamp ability can blind opponents, severely hindering their combat effectiveness.
skills: Has a passive Perception of 13, allowing it to notice opponents with average success.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Dexterity saving throws due to high Dexterity score.
Has a special ability to jump great distances, improving its ambush capabilities.
Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in swampy environments.
Can move with its target when attached, increasing the challenge for opponents.
test_queries: small swamp creature with jumping abilities
agile monster that blinds its enemies
ambushing creature with unique combat skills
stealthy monster that excels in swamp environments
creature that can attach to its victim's head
